title: Lydia Millet on 'Fight No More'
description: Millet discusses her new collection of stories, and Alexandra Jacobs talks about Jamie Bernstein’s “Famous Father Girl: A Memoir of Growing Up Bernstein.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
